translation: Sutra of Encouragement of Goodness, 1 volume
I commanded the left chancellor, Jia.
I ordered him to send down a list of good sentient beings from the provinces.
Recite Amitâbha Buddha's name 1,000 times a day.
They should stop speaking evil and do good deeds.
This year, it's been a great heat, and there's no one to collect the goods.
Several people have died of illness.
The first was sick from abuse.
Second, they died of the disease of divine behavior.
Third, they'll die of red and white dysentery.
Fourth, there's the disease of red eyes, which kills him.
The fifth is the death of the disease of human birth.
The sixth is death from watery diarrhea.
The seventh is death from wind sickness.

source_sentence: 今勸眾生寫此經免一門難。
translation: We now encourage sentient beings to write this sūtra to avoid the difficulties of one approach.
It's written by six relatives.
Those who see this sūtra and don't write it will be extinguished at the gate.
Those above and below the gate can surpass this difficulty.
Those without good fortune won't be able to see this sūtra.
This sūtra came from the south.
On the eighth day of the first month, thunder and lightning struck.
There was a boy in the sky.
He was four years old.
He also saw an old man on the road.
He saw a snake with a body 10,000 feet long.
A human-headed bird was disemboweling him, so he called out to the old man.
"It's because Mt. Tai is crumbling.

source_sentence: 要女人萬萬眾須得片萬萬願著病難差。
translation: To save a woman, tens of thousands of people must obtain a piece of the million vows that make it difficult to get sick.
Whoever writes this sūtra will be spared this difficulty.

source_sentence: 不信者但看四月一日三家使一牛五男同一婦僧尼巡門難。
translation: If you don't believe it, just look at the difficulty of three families making a cow, five men, and a woman, monks, and nuns go on a tour on the first day of the fourth month.
Writing this sūtra transmits the true words of the sages.

source_sentence: 若袚[夙-歹+十]風[哅-凵]却不免難。
translation: 'If I were to wipe out the [long-exiled+ten] winds [gusts of the receptacle], I wouldn't be spared this difficulty.'

source_sentence: 相勸阿彌陀佛不久見太平時。
translation: He encourages Amitâbha Buddha to see peace soon.
One Fascicle of the Sutra on Encouraging Goodness
